awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Algorithms for Mathematical          Programming
awd_abstract_narration: This project will develop, analyze, and implement algorithms               for solving mathematical programming problems.  It is planned to                focus on simplex algorithms, interior point algorithms, and                     methods that combine them.  The research on simplex algorithms                  will be directed towards solving network flow problems including                maximum flow, minimum flow, generalized network flow problems,                  and multicommodity flow problems. The research on interior point                algorithms will concentrate on solving structured linear                        programs, exploring large step path-following algorithms, solving               nonlinear programming problems.                                                      This research will involve theoretical analysis of the                     algorithms and their implementation and empirical testing.                      Extensive areas of society where operations research is required                will benefit from this project.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK
